name: Epic Tank Battle Simulator 3D
description:
Your are commander of toon army. You can select tanks from list and start tank battle simulation! Be a brave soldier on the battlefield of WW2!
Be a fearless warrior on the battleground in Royale battle mode!

Epic Tank Battle Simulator 3D features:
- Amazing battle simulator game
- WW2 toon tanks
- Smart enemies AI
- Cool graphic style
- Collect big army
- Be the commander of the army

Select metal tanks and start WW2 armored warfare battle simulator!
